channel.title: AVRFuses Changelog
channel.description: Changes and updates for AVRFuses by Jason von Nieda

item.title: Version 1.4.4
item.description: <li>Added avrdude command line logging to log window at the request of several users. This is configurable via the Preferences. <li>Integrated new part information. <li>Added some coloration to different log messages to help differentiate what is happening. <li>Added .eep to the list of acceptable file types for EEPROM read/write/verify. <li>Upgraded Sparkle framework to current version.

item.title: Version 1.4
item.description: <li>Fixed issue with checking for updates on startup not being disableable. <li>Made window resizable. <li>Cleaned up avrdude argument building code. <li>Made port optional; required for some programmers. <li>Made port a drop down containing common ports found on the system for easier selection. <li>Added setting for baud rate; used for serial based programmers. <li>Started work on Lock Bits editor but decided to hold it for 1.5. This release needed to get out now. Lock Bits removed for now.

item.title: Version 1.3
item.description: <li>Added avrdude error logging to log window on operation failures. <li>Added support for automatic updates using Sparkle.
